summary: Comprehensive testing of WineStudy P0 (81 grape varieties) and P1 (advanced study track, tasting diary) features completed successfully. All backend APIs and frontend pages working correctly.
passed_tests: GET /api/grapes?aroma=Cherry filters grapes by aroma correctly
GET /api/tastings returns user's tastings with auth
GET /api/auth/me returns user info with valid token
Landing page loads correctly with navigation
Grapes page shows 81 grapes with filters (Todas/Tintas/Brancas)
Grapes page aroma filter section present
Study page shows 3 tracks with correct lesson counts
Tasting page redirects to login when not authenticated
Tasting list page shows user's tastings when authenticated
Tasting detail page shows all WSET SAT sections
Tasting form page has all required fields and aroma tags
seed_data_creation: Test user created with session token for tasting API tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 and P1 features verified: 81 grape varieties (43 red, 38 white) from 11 countries, 3 study tracks (basic 5, intermediate 8, advanced 10 lessons), tasting diary with WSET SAT format. Test user and session created for authenticated endpoint testing. Pytest test file created at /app/tests/test_winestudy_api.py for regression testing.
